mapper.select: SELECT n.news_id, n.title, n.link, n.image, n.created_at, n.updated_at, sn.saved_news_id, sn.created_at as saved_at FROM NEWS n JOIN SAVED_NEWS sn ON n.news_id = sn.news_id WHERE sn.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY sn.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAVED_NEWS (news_id, user_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{newsId}, #{userId}, NOW(), NOW())
